mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_team(team_id, captain_id, team_name, team_state, team_headcount, competition_id, team_content) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{captain.userId}, #{teamName}, #{teamState}, #{teamHeadcount}, #{competition.competitionId}, #{teamContent})
mapper.select: SELECT t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, t.team_content team_content, t.team_state team_state,t.team_headcount team_headcount, t.team_content team_content, c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_name competition_name FROM t_team t LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON t.competition_id = c.competition_id LEFT JOIN t_user_team ut ON t.team_id = ut.team_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{v} AND ut.user_id != t.captain_id

SELECT t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, t.team_content team_content, t.team_state team_state, t.apply_time apply_time,t.team_content team_content, c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_name competition_name, u.user_id user_id FROM t_team t LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON t.competition_id = c.competition_id LEFT JOIN t_user_team ut ON t.team_id = ut.team_id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON t.captain_id = u.user_id WHERE (t.captain_id = #{userId} OR ut.user_id = #{userId}) AND t.competition_id = #{competitionId}

SELECT t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, t.team_content team_content, t.team_state team_state,t.team_headcount team_headcount, t.apply_time apply_time,t.team_content team_content, c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_name competition_name, c.competition_people_sum competition_people_sum FROM t_team t LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON t.competition_id = c.competition_id WHERE t.captain_id = #{v}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_team( team_id, user_id) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id user_id, u.name name, u.user_className user_className ,c.college_name college_name FROM t_user_team ut LEFT JOIN t_user u On ut.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_college c On u.college_id = c.college_id WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND u.user_id != #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_team SET team_name = #{teamName}, team_content = #{teamContent} WHERE team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_user_team WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND user_id = #{userId}
